title: health api health status check
description: Verify that the /api/health endpoint returns a 200 OK status indicating the server is alive and responsive.

title: products api list and manage products
description: Test the products API endpoints to ensure products and variants can be listed, retrieved by id or slug, updated, and managed correctly.

title: orders api internal supplier order placement
description: Validate the internal API endpoint /api/internal/create-supplier-order correctly groups order items by supplier and places supplier orders with external supplier systems.

title: payments api checkout and webhook processing
description: Test the payments API endpoints for creating checkout sessions and processing payment webhooks to ensure orders are correctly updated upon payment events.

title: collections api crud operations
description: Verify CRUD operations on product collections and the ability to attach or detach products from collections via the collections API.

title: uploads presign api generate s3 presigned url
description: Test the uploads presign API to ensure it generates valid S3 presigned URLs for file uploads with correct permissions and expiration.

title: admin auth api login logout and session info
description: Validate admin authentication endpoints for login, logout, session retrieval, and password upgrade functionalities.

title: sentinel api db off sentinel file management
description: Test the sentinel API endpoints to create, delete, and check the DB_OFF sentinel file to simulate database unavailability scenarios.

title: supplier webhooks hmac verification and update
description: Verify that webhook endpoints for Spocket, AutoDS, and Modalyst validate incoming requests using HMAC signatures and update order status and tracking data accordingly.

title: cron api trigger catalog sync job
description: Test the cron API endpoint to trigger the catalog synchronization job that fetches and upserts product data from all registered suppliers.
